solution_line_template: At the end of the first year, there will be ${initial_deposit} * ({interest_factor}) = $<<{initial_deposit}*{interest_factor}={money_after_year1}>>{money_after_year1} in the bank account.
At the end of the second year, there will be ${money_after_year1} * ({interest_factor}) = $<<{money_after_year1}*({interest_factor})={money_after_year2}>>{money_after_year2}
